001package apprepo;
002
003import jakarta.servlet.Servlet;
004import jakarta.servlet.ServletConfig;
005import jakarta.servlet.ServletException;
006import jakarta.servlet.annotation.WebServlet;
007import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServlet;
008import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest;
009import jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse;
010import java.io.IOException;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.List;
013
014/**
015 * Servlet implementation class FilterServlet
016 */
017public class FilterServlet extends HttpServlet {
018        private static final long serialVersionUID = 1L;
019        ServletConfig configNextGen; 
020        /**
021         * @see Servlet#init(ServletConfig)
022         */
023        public void init(ServletConfig config) throws ServletException {
024                configNextGen =  config; 
025        }
026
027        /**
028         * @see Servlet#getServletConfig()
029         */
030        public ServletConfig getServletConfig() {
031                
032                return configNextGen;
033        }
034       
035    /**
036     * @see HttpServlet#HttpServlet()
037     */
038    public FilterServlet() {
039        super();
040        // TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
041    }
042
043        /**
044         * @see HttpServlet#doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
045         */
046        protected void doGet(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
047                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
048                response.getWriter().append("Served at: ").append(request.getContextPath());
049        }
050
051        /**
052         * @see HttpServlet#doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response)
053         */
054        protected void doPost(HttpServletRequest request, HttpServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {
055                // TODO Auto-generated method stub
056                //doGet(request, response);
057                String query = request.getParameter("query");
058                List<Application> appList = (List<Application>) request.getSession().getAttribute("applications");
059                List<Application> appFiltered = new ArrayList<>();
060                for (int i = 0; i<appList.size(); i++) {
061                        Application app = appList.get(i);
062                        if(app.getName().equalsIgnoreCase(query)) {
063                                appFiltered.add(app);
064                        }
065                        
066                }
067                request.getSession().setAttribute("applications", appFiltered);
068                // Forward to JSP to display the data
069            request.getRequestDispatcher("/displayApplications.jsp").forward(request, response);
070                
071        }
072
073}
